trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en Windows-verktøylinjen.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> replaces and adds functionality to the ToolBar control of previous versions, ToolBar is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Selv om <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> erstatter og legger til funksjoner på verktøylinjen kontrollen i tidligere versjoner verktøylinjen er beholdt for bakoverkompatibilitet og fremtidig bruk hvis du velger.

trans-unit.source: ToolBar controls are used to display <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls that can appear as a standard button, a toggle-style button, or a drop-down style button.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller brukes til å vise <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>Kontroller som kan vises som et standard-knappen, en vekslingen-stil, eller en rullegardinlisten stilen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>

trans-unit.source: You can assign images to the buttons by creating an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>, assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImageList%2A> property of the toolbar, and assigning the image index value to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A> property each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan knytte bilder til knappene ved å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>tilordne den til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImageList%2A>egenskapen på verktøylinjen og tilordne bildet Indeksverdien til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapen hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: You can then assign text to be displayed underneath or to the right of the image by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du tilordne teksten som skal vises under eller til høyre for bildet ved å sette <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property of the toolbar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance> to give the toolbar and its buttons a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>for verktøylinjen for å <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance>slik at verktøylinjen og tilhørende knapper en flat virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: Som musen flytter pekeren over knappene endringer utseendet til tredimensjonale.

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators.
trans-unit.target: Knappene på verktøylinjen kan deles i logiske grupper ved hjelp av skilletegn.

trans-unit.source: A separator is a toolbar button with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A> property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`.
trans-unit.target: Et skilletegn er en knapp med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A>-egenskapen satt til `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the toolbar has a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: Knappen skilletegn vises som linjer i stedet for mellomrom mellom knappene når verktøylinjen har et flatt utseende.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance>, the toolbar buttons appear raised and three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance>, knappene på verktøylinjen vises hevet og tredimensjonale.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A> property, all buttons in the tool bar are restricted to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A>egenskapen alle knappene i verktøylinjen er begrenset til den angitte størrelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the buttons adjust their size depending on their content, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A> property returns the initial size of the largest button.
trans-unit.target: Ellers knappene Juster størrelsen avhengig av innholdet, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A>egenskapen returnerer den opprinnelige størrelsen for knappen største.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls to display on the ToolBar, add the buttons individually by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Til å opprette en samling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>kontrolltypene som skal vises på verktøylinjen legger seg knappene ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A>metoder for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A newly created toolbar control is empty; add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En nyopprettede Verktøylinjekontroll er tom. Legg til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>Kontroller ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the value that determines the appearance of a toolbar control and its buttons.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som bestemmer utseendet til en Verktøylinjekontroll og knappene.

trans-unit.source: The Appearance property affects the appearance of the buttons assigned to the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen utseendet påvirker utseendet på knappene tildelt verktøylinjen.

trans-unit.source: When the appearance is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the toolbar's buttons appear three-dimensional and raised.
trans-unit.target: Når utseendet er satt til `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, vises på verktøylinjen knappene tredimensjonale og hevet.

trans-unit.source: Set the Appearance property of the toolbar to `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` to give the toolbar's buttons a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen utseendet for verktøylinjen for å `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` slik at verktøylinjen for knappene en flat virkning.

trans-unit.source: As the mouse pointer moves over the flat buttons, they appear raised and three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: Når musepekeren flyttes over flate knappene, vises de hevet og tredimensjonale.

trans-unit.source: Separators on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> with the Appearance property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance> appear as etched lines rather than spaces between the raised buttons.
trans-unit.target: Skilletegn på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>med utseendet-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance>vises som Etset linjer i stedet for mellomrom mellom knappene hevet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: The flat style buttons give your application a more Web-like look.
trans-unit.target: Knappene flate stil gi programmet litt mer Web-lignende.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolBarAppearance.Normal" name="ToolBarAppearance.Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolBarAppearance.Normal" name="ToolBarAppearance.Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and the dock style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verktøylinjen justerer størrelsen automatisk basert på størrelsen på knappene og forankringen-stil.

trans-unit.source: When AutoSize is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control sizes itself to accommodate the toolbar buttons, based upon the button size, the number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects it contains, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Når Autostørrelse er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>kontrollen størrelsen på selve for å tillate knappene på verktøylinjen, basert på knappestørrelsen, antall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>objektene i den, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>på verktøylinjen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and dock style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verktøylinjen justerer automatisk størrelsen, basert på størrelsen på knappene og forankringen stil; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize*>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: The background color.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackColorChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle BackColorChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet.

trans-unit.source: The background image.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnsbildet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle BackgroundImageChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout for background image.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir oppsettet for bakgrunnsbildet.

trans-unit.source: The layout for background image.
trans-unit.target: Oppsett for bakgrunnsbildet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageLayoutChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle BackgroundImageLayoutChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the toolbar control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for verktøylinjen kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> can take on a sunken, three-dimensional appearance when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property is set to `BorderStyle.Fixed3D`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>kan inneholde et senket, tredimensjonale utseende når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>er satt til `BorderStyle.Fixed3D`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: To display a flat thin border around the toolbar control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to `BorderStyle.FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en flate tynn kantlinje kontrollens verktøylinjen, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>egenskapen `BorderStyle.FixedSingle`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_BorderStyle.None" name="BorderStyle.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_BorderStyle.None" name="BorderStyle.None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drop-down style <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> or its down arrow is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en stil for rullegardinlisten <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> eller pil ned klikkes.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> controls assigned to the toolbar control.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> Kontroller tilordnet verktøylinjen kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Buttons property is a zero-based indexed collection used to hold all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls assigned to the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen knapper er en nullbasert indekserte samling som inneholder alle de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>Kontroller tilordnet verktøylinjen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>

trans-unit.source: Because the property is read-only, it can not be assigned a collection of toolbar buttons directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordi egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet, kan den ikke tilordnes en samling av knappene på verktøylinjen direkte.

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons can be added or removed by using the methods inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Knappene på verktøylinjen kan legges til eller fjernes ved hjelp av metoder arvet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> method to add individual buttons and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A> method to delete a button.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>metode for å legge til knapper og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>metode for å slette en knapp.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the buttons from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle knappene fra samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>som inneholder en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the buttons on the toolbar control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på knappene verktøylinjen kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the ButtonSize is not set, it is set to its default.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ButtonSize ikke er angitt, settes den til standard.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> is computed to accommodate the largest <xref:System.Drawing.Image> and text assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også en <xref:System.Drawing.Size>beregnes å gi plass til den største <xref:System.Drawing.Image>og tekst som er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that represents the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> controls on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> objektet som representerer størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> vises på verktøylinjen.

trans-unit.source: The default size has a width of 24 pixels and a height of 22 pixels, or large enough to accommodate the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> and text, whichever is greater.
trans-unit.target: Standardstørrelsen har en bredde på 24 piksler og høyden på 22 piksler, eller stor nok for å gi plass til den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> og tekst, avhengig av hva som er større.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> property of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> eller <> </> *>-egenskapen for den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> objektet som er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et håndtak for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige oppretting parameterne når håndtaket for kontrollen som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardmodus Input metoden redigeringsprogrammet (IME) støttes av denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Som implementert i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>klasse egenskapen returnerer alltid den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar displays a divider.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verktøylinjen vises en skillelinjen.

trans-unit.source: Dividers are displayed to help distinguish the toolbar from adjacent controls, such as menus.
trans-unit.target: Hjelp vises for å skille verktøylinjen fra tilstøtende kontroller, for eksempel menyer.

trans-unit.source: A divider is displayed as a raised edge along the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control.
trans-unit.target: En skillelinjen vises som en hevet kant øverst i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the toolbar displays a divider; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verktøylinjen vises skillelinjen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjer som kontrollen er forankret til den overordnede kontrollen og angir hvordan en kontroll endres med sin overordnede.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drop-down buttons on a toolbar display down arrows.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rullegardinlisten knappene på en verktøylinje viser pil ned.

trans-unit.source: When DropDownArrows is set to `false`, no down arrows display on drop-down style toolbar buttons.
trans-unit.target: Når DropDownArrows er satt til `false`, ingen ned pil vises i rullegardinlisten stilknappene på verktøylinjen.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the drop-down button on the toolbar, the menu drops down for selection.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren klikker rullegardinlisten-knappen på verktøylinjen, åpnes menyen for valg.

trans-unit.source: When the drop-down arrow is displayed, the user must press the down arrow to display the menu.
trans-unit.target: Når rullegardinpilen vises, må brukeren trykke pil ned for å vise-menyen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drop-down toolbar buttons display down arrows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rullegardinlisten verktøylinjen knappene viser pil; ned Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the forecolor .
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forecolor.

trans-unit.source: The forecolor.
trans-unit.target: Forecolor.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ForeColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ForeColor*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ForeColor%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the ForeColorChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ForeColor%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle ForeColorChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of images available to the toolbar button controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir samlingen av bilder som er tilgjengelig på verktøylinjen for kontroller.

trans-unit.source: If you create an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> and assign it to the ImageList property, you can assign an image from the collection to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls by assigning the image's index value to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A> property of the toolbar button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>og tilordne til egenskapen ImageList, kan du tilordne et bilde fra samlingen til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>Kontroller ved å tilordne bildets indeksverdi til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A>for knappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains images available to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> som inneholder bilder som er tilgjengelig for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the images in the image list assigned to the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på bildene i bildelisten tildelt verktøylinjen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the images (in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>) assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen på bildene (i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>) tildelt av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImeMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImeMode*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImeMode%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the ImeModeChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImeMode%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandle ImeModeChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnButtonClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnButtonClick kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonDropDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonDropDown"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnButtonDropDown method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnButtonDropDown kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnFontChanged method resizes the toolbar buttons to fit the size of the new font.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFontChanged endrer størrelse på knappene på verktøylinjen tilpasses størrelsen på den nye skriften.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.RightToLeft*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.RightToLeft%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the RightToLeftChanged event to detect the change.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Skaleres kontrollens plassering, størrelse, utfylling og margin.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: Faktorer som høyden og bredden på kontrollen skal skaleres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdi som angir grensene for kontrollen skal brukes når du definerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er relevante for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett skaleringsfaktoren.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett skaleringsfaktoren.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir de angitte grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SetBoundsCore method ignores width if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetBoundsCore ignorerer bredden hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: SetBoundsCore ignores height if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: SetBoundsCore ignorerer høyde hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""> </xref> egenskapsverdi for kontrollen.

trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""> </xref> egenskapsverdi for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref uid="langword_csharp_Width" name="Width" href=""></xref> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref uid="langword_csharp_Width" name="Width" href=""> </xref> egenskapsverdi for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Ikke brukt.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar displays a ToolTip for each button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verktøylinjen vises et verktøytips for hver knapp.

trans-unit.source: To set the text displayed by the ToolTip, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ToolTipText%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ToolTipText%2A>egenskapen for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ToolTipText%2A> du angir teksten som vises verktøytipset ved

trans-unit.source: To cause the ToolTip to display as the user moves the mouse pointer over the toolbar button, set the ShowToolTips property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil verktøytipset å vise når brukeren flytter pekeren over knappen, angi ShowToolTips egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the toolbar display a ToolTip for each button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verktøylinjen viser et verktøytips for hver knapp; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for verktøylinjen.

trans-unit.source: The text for the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for verktøylinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text in relation to each image displayed on the toolbar button controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstjusteringen i forhold til hvert bilde vises på verktøylinjen for kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A> can be aligned underneath or to the right of the image displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A>kan være justert under eller til høyre for bildet vises på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarTextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarTextAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolBarTextAlign.Underneath" name="ToolBarTextAlign.Underneath" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolBarTextAlign.Underneath" name="ToolBarTextAlign.Underneath" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarTextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarTextAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TextChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text%2A>egenskapen er ikke mening for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og behandler TextChanged-hendelsen for å finne endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the type, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>, and the string returned by the ToString method of the toolbar’s first button.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ToString returnerer en streng som inneholder typen verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>, og strengen som ble returnert av metoden ToString for første-knappen på verktøylinjen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: A String that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar buttons wrap to the next line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om knappene på verktøylinjen bryte til neste linje hvis den blir for liten til å vise alle knappene på samme linje.

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators.
trans-unit.target: Knappene på verktøylinjen kan deles i logiske grupper ved hjelp av skilletegn.

trans-unit.source: A separator is a toolbar button with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A> property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`.
trans-unit.target: Et skilletegn er en knapp med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A>-egenskapen satt til `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Wrappable property is set to `true` and the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line, the toolbar is broken into additional lines, with the breaks occurring at the separators.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen Wrappable er satt til `true` og den blir for liten til å vise alle knappene på samme linje, verktøylinjen er delt i flere linjer med sideskift foretas skilletegnene.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that button groups stay together.
trans-unit.target: Dette sikrer at grupper holdes sammen.

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons that are not in a group can be separated when the toolbar wraps.
trans-unit.target: Knappene på verktøylinjen som ikke finnes i en gruppe kan deles når verktøylinjen brytes.

trans-unit.source: The toolbar can become too small to display all its buttons on the same line if its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is resized.
trans-unit.target: Verktøylinjen kan bli for liten til å vise alle knappene på samme linje hvis overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the toolbar buttons wrap to another line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis knappene på verktøylinjen brytes til en annen linje hvis den blir for liten til å vise alle knappene på samme linjen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
